articles.title: You Are Nothing Compared To This $30,000 PC - Kotaku Australia
articles.description: However good you think your gaming PC is, it is absolutely nothing compared to this $30,000 monster built by Australian firm Aftershock.
articles.content:
However good you think your gaming PC or setup is, it will not come anywhere close to matching the enormity of this $30,000-plus build done for one Aussie gamer.
